fields_of_interest: Competition, Energy, Environment, Taxation, Research and innovation, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: legislation related to Energy, Resources, Environment, Safety
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Technical Working Group for Risk Management and Best Available Techniques for hydrocarbons exploration and production#E03348#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3348#Member#C
goals__remit: Assomineraria, the Italian Petroleum and Mining Industry Association, represents the companies operating on the national territory in the exploration and production of oil and natural gas, industrial and energy minerals, as well as geothermal fluids. It also represents the companies supplying equipment and services to the petroleum and mining industry.
